SELECT detail.*,commparam.COMMADDR FROM ppf_customer_fee_month_detail detail LEFT JOIN ppf_customer customer ON detail.CUSTOMERID = customer.CUSTOMERID LEFT JOIN obj_point_commparam commparam ON detail.POINTID = commparam.POINTID WHERE customer.HH = #{hh} AND customer.EID = #{eid} AND DATATIME IN
